snippet: The Swedish defense research and technology agency has been helping Saudi Arabia build a weapons factory that would produce antitank missiles, Swedish public radio reported Tuesday.
abstract: Swedish public radio reports that the country's defense research and technology agency has secretly been helping Saudi Arabia build a weapons factory that would produce antitank missiles; announcement provokes calls for a parliamentary inquiry.
lead_paragraph: The Swedish defense research and technology agency has been helping Saudi Arabia build a weapons factory that would produce antitank missiles, Swedish public radio reported Tuesday.

headline.main: Sweden: Government Said to Aid Saudis in Building Factory for Antitank Missiles
headline.print_headline: Sweden: Government Said to Aid Saudis In Building Factory for Antitank Missiles
